message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $13,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering its value.  What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $11,500. Would you be willing to accept $11,000?
